name: mermaid
description: Using weasyprint, mermaid.js a mermaid image is created from text. In future we will support prompt using the assistant cog as dependency
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Thanks for using my cog. Feel free on hitting me up on the Red discord server and joining me on my AI journey.
author: Tin Nguyen
